technology.subtitle: THE TECHNOLOGY
technology.title: How JyvDesktop's Spatial Audio Works
technology.description1: Our advanced HRTF (Head-Related Transfer Function) technology simulates how sound interacts with your head and ears, creating a precise three-dimensional audio experience.
technology.description2: Unlike standard stereo, JyvDesktop processes each sound source independently, applying complex binaural algorithms that replicate natural acoustic properties.

hrtf.title: Personalized HRTF Processing
hrtf.description: Customized audio filtering based on ear and head anatomy

positioning.title: Real-time Dynamic Positioning
positioning.description: Sound sources adapt instantly as you reposition them

acoustics.title: Environmental Acoustics
acoustics.description: Accurate simulation of different acoustic spaces

cta.description: Transform how you hear digital audio with JyvDesktop's advanced spatial audio technology. Try it free for 14 days with full access to all features.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about JyvDesktop's spatial audio technology

headphones.question: Do I need special headphones to experience spatial audio?
headphones.answer: No, JyvDesktop's spatial audio works with any headphones or earbuds. However, higher quality headphones will deliver a more immersive experience. For best results, we recommend using over-ear headphones with a wide frequency response.

surroundSound.question: How is this different from surround sound?
surroundSound.answer: Traditional surround sound relies on multiple physical speakers positioned around you. JyvDesktop's spatial audio creates a fully three-dimensional sound field using just two channels (stereo), precisely calculating how sound waves interact with your head and ears to create a natural, immersive experience.

gaming.question: Can I use spatial audio for gaming?
gaming.answer: Absolutely! In fact, gaming is one of the best applications for spatial audio. JyvDesktop can enhance your gaming experience by providing precise audio positioning, helping you locate enemies, identify environmental cues, and immerse yourself more deeply in game worlds.

compatibility.question: Does spatial audio work with all applications?
compatibility.answer: Yes, JyvDesktop processes audio at the system level, which means it works with virtually any application that produces sound. This includes streaming services, video conferencing tools, games, media players, and more.

faq.title: Security & Privacy FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about how we protect your data

recording.question: Does JyvDesktop record or store my audio?
recording.answer: No, JyvDesktop does not record or store any of your audio content. All processing happens in real-time directly on your device, and the original audio data is immediately discarded after processing.

dataCollection.question: What data does JyvDesktop collect about me?
dataCollection.answer: By default, JyvDesktop collects no personal data. The only data stored locally are your application settings and preferences. If you opt in to anonymous usage statistics, we collect minimal technical information to improve the application, but this never includes any audio content or personally identifiable information.

localProcessing.question: How does local processing protect my privacy?
localProcessing.answer: Local processing means your audio never leaves your device. Instead of sending data to cloud servers for processing (where it could potentially be stored, analyzed, or compromised), JyvDesktop handles everything directly on your computer, ensuring your conversations and audio content remain private.

internetConnection.question: Do I need an internet connection to use JyvDesktop?
internetConnection.answer: No, JyvDesktop works completely offline. An internet connection is only required for initial download, updates, and license verification for premium features.
